hours_text:
### Ticket Price

$16

  * All Lake County Residents are free!
  * We also offer discounts to students, seniors, and military members, available with a valid ID at the front desk. 
  * You can purchase tickets online or at the front desk upon entry.

Welcome to a new perspective

# Explore The Wonders Found Underground

Monday | Closed

Tuesday-Saturday | 10:00AM – 4:00PM, last entry at 3:15PM

Sunday | 10:00AM – 3:00PM, last entry at 2:15PM
